<small>Aramaic form: [[H5870]]</small>
 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹוֵן‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] [[1Sam.18.9|1Sam 18:9]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עין‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוְעִים‎</span> see below I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוה‎</span>. 

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַ֫יִן‎</span><sub>859</sub> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]]</sup> and ([[Zech.3.9|Zech 3:9]]; [[Zech.4.10|Zech 4:10]] [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896), 75</sup>) **masculine** ==eye== (ancient Semitic word; √ and relation to II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> unknown; Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ען‎</span>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיְינָא‎</span> Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עינא‎</span> Zinjirli suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עיני‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עינך‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ênu***</u></abbr>, ***enu***, Tel Amarna suffix ***inaya*** and (apparently Canaanite gloss <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—inaya***</u></abbr>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Exod.21.4|Exod 21:4]] +, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין‎</span> v[[Exod.21.26|Exod 21:26]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינִי‎</span> [[Gen.44.21|Gen 44:21]] + ([[2Sam.16.12|2Sam 16:12]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנְיִי‎</span> [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] Comm.), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינְךָ‎</span> [[Deut.7.16|Deut 7:16]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵנוּ‎</span> [[Ps.35.21|Ps 35:21]] ([[2Sam.20.6|2Sam 20:6]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נצל‎</span> Hiph\`il); suffix 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָם‎</span> [[Isa.13.18|Isa 13:18]] ([[Zech.5.6|Zech 5:6]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲוֺנָם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵמוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.73.7|Ps 73:7]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲוֺנָמוֺ‎</span> see Commentaries); usually dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינַיִם‎</span> [[Gen.20.16|Gen 20:16]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָ֑יִם‎</span> [[Isa.3.16|Isa 3:16]] +, especially construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֵי‎</span> [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵנֵי‎</span> [[Isa.3.8|Isa 3:8]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינַי‎</span> [[Gen.31.10|Gen 31:10]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינֶיךָ‎</span> [[Judg.6.17|Judg 6:17]] +, etc. ([[Hos.10.10|Hos 10:10]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲוֺנֹתָם‎</span> compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]); — ***eye:*** 

**1.** literally ==as physical organ==, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of man [[Exod.21.6|Exod 21:6]] (3 t. in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.3.6|Gen 3:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) +, [[Lev.21.20|Lev 21:20]]; [[Lev.24.20|Lev 24:20]] (twice in verse); [[Lev.26.16|Lev 26:16]] ([[BDB#H|H]]; very rarely [[BDB#P|P]], e.g. [[Deut.34.4|Deut 34:4]]; [[Deut.34.7|Deut 34:7]]), [[2Kgs.4.34|2Kgs 4:34]] (twice in verse) +; once <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁתֵּי עֵינַי‎</span> [[Judg.16.28|Judg 16:28]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** anthropomorph. of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.33.18|Ps 33:18]]; [[Ps.34.16|Ps 34:16]] +. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of idols [[Ps.115.5|Ps 115:5]]; [[Ps.135.16|Ps 135:16]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of beasts [[Gen.30.41|Gen 30:41]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Job.40.24|Job 40:24]] (hippop., si vera lectio, but probably corrupt [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] where see conjectures), [[Job.41.10|Job 41:10]] (crocodile); bird [[Job.28.7|Job 28:7]]; [[Job.39.29|Job 39:29]]; . 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** in wheels [[Ezek.1.18|Ezek 1:18]] compare [[Ezek.10.12|Ezek 10:12]] on stone [[Zech.3.9|Zech 3:9]] (all in visions). **feminine** subject of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראה‎</span> ***see*** [[Gen.45.12|Gen 45:12]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]), + (often Deuteronomy), with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חזה‎</span> [[Ps.11.4|Ps 11:4]] men ***see*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּע‎</span> [[Deut.3.27|Deut 3:27]]; [[2Kgs.7.12|2Kgs 7:12]] +; especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׂא ע‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראה‎</span> [[Gen.13.10|Gen 13:10]]; [[Gen.10.14|Gen 10:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) +; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְכָלמַֿרְאֵה עֵינֵי הַכֹּהֵן‎</span> [[Lev.13.12|Lev 13:12]] = ***as far as the priest can see***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְאֵה ע‎</span> [[Deut.28.34|Deut 28:34]] ***what is seen by the eyes*** = v[[Deut.28.67|Deut 28:67]]; [[Eccl.6.9|Eccl 6:9]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **g.** as affected by sleep, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁנָה‎</span> below [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשֵׁן‎</span>]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **h.** as weeping, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקוֺר דִּמְעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Jer.8.23|Jer 8:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִגְּרָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Lam.3.49|Lam 3:49]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּֽלְפָה ע‎</span> [[Job.16.20|Job 16:20]] see also [[Jer.31.16|Jer 31:16]]; [[Ps.116.8|Ps 116:8]], and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירד‎</span> **Qal 3 c. i.** ==as growing dim==, see I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּהָה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָשַׁךְ‎</span> **3**; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּבֵד‎</span> [[Gen.48.10|Gen 48:10]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּם‎</span> [[1Sam.4.15|1Sam 4:15]]; [[1Kgs.14.4|1Kgs 14:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁעַע‎</span> [[Isa.32.3|Isa 32:3]]; [[Isa.6.10|Isa 6:10]] (Hiph\`il); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלָה‎</span> ***pine, languish***, see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> **Qal 2 b, Pi\`el 2 b**, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּאַב‎</span> [[Ps.88.10|Ps 88:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשַׁשׁ‎</span> [[Ps.6.8|Ps 6:8]]; [[Ps.31.10|Ps 31:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּלַל‎</span> [[Isa.38.14|Isa 38:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **j.** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּקַח‎</span> ***open***, after sleep [[Job.27.19|Job 27:19]], sleep of death [[2Kgs.4.35|2Kgs 4:35]] = ***keep awake*** [[Prov.20.13|Prov 20:13]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁנָה‎</span>); of new power of vision [[Gen.3.5|Gen 3:5]]; [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), given by God [[Gen.21.19|Gen 21:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Kgs.6.17|2Kgs 6:17]] (twice in verse); so (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְגַל‎</span>) [[Num.22.31|Num 22:31]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); = ***give sight to*** blind [[2Kgs.6.20|2Kgs 6:20]] (twice in verse); [[Isa.35.5|Isa 35:5]]; [[Isa.42.7|Isa 42:7]]; [[Ps.146.8|Ps 146:8]] of God (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) opening his eyes, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּקַח ע‎</span> [[2Kgs.19.16|2Kgs 19:16]] = [[Isa.37.17|Isa 37:17]]; [[Dan.9.18|Dan 9:18]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלֿ‎</span> [[Jer.32.19|Jer 32:19]]; [[Zech.12.4|Zech 12:4]]; [[Job.14.3|Job 14:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> {abbrev}<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂי֥֥ ע‎</span> [[Gen.44.21|Gen 44:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Jer.39.12|Jer 39:12]]; [[Jer.40.4|Jer 40:4]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לטובה‎</span> [[Jer.24.6|Jer 24:6]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לרעה‎</span> [[Amos.9.4|Amos 9:4]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּתַח‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.29|1Kgs 8:29]] = [[2Chr.6.20|2Chr 6:20]]; [[1Kgs.8.52|1Kgs 8:52]]; [[Neh.1.6|Neh 1:6]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[2Chr.6.40|2Chr 6:40]]; [[2Chr.7.15|2Chr 7:15]] + infinitive [[Neh.1.6|Neh 1:6]]. — [[Num.24.3|Num 24:3]]; [[Num.24.15|Num 24:15]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁתם‎</span> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **k.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺר ע‎</span> etc., = ***revive***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אור‎</span> 

**verb Qal, Hiph\`il; noun, 10.** 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַץ ע‎</span> = ***wink*** [[Ps.35.19|Ps 35:19]]; [[Prov.10.10|Prov 10:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Prov.6.13|Prov 6:13]]. **masculine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְזְמוּן ע‎</span> [[Job.15.12|Job 15:12]] i.e. ***roll*** (in anger). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **n.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָטַשׁ ע‎</span> [[Job.16.9|Job 16:9]] ***whet eyes against*** = 'look daggers at.' 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **o.** ***put out*** eye, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִוֵּר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקר‎</span> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **p.** as feature of beauty, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפֵה ע‎</span> [[Deut.16.12|Deut 16:12]] compare [[Song.4.9|Song 4:9]]; [[Song.7.5|Song 7:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Song.1.15|Song 1:15]]; [[Song.4.1|Song 4:1]] and [[Song.5.12|Song 5:12]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּיוֺנִים‎</span>); on other hand, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵאָה רַכּוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Gen.29.17|Gen 29:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתָּשֶׂם בַּפּוּךְ ע‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.30|2Kgs 9:30]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּךְ‎</span>), compare [[Jer.4.30|Jer 4:30]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּחַל ע‎</span> [[Ezek.23.40|Ezek 23:40]] ***paint*** the ***eyes*** . 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **q.** ***apple of the eye***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁוֺן‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּבָה‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּת‎</span> 

**6. r.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַּבֹּת ע‎</span> [[Lev.14.9|Lev 14:9]] ***eyebrows***. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **s.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַכְלִילִי ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִָיּ֑יִן‎</span> [[Gen.49.12|Gen 49:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַכְלִילוּת ע‎</span> [[Prov.23.29|Prov 23:29]] (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ח‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְאוֺר ע‎</span> [[Prov.15.30|Prov 15:30]], see Toy. 

**2. a.** ==eyes as shewing mental qualities: arrogance== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גַבְהוּת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Isa.2.11|Isa 2:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְבֹהִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Isa.5.15|Isa 5:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּבַהּעֿ‎</span> [[Ps.101.5|Ps 101:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְאֶרֶת רוּם ע‎</span> [[Isa.10.12|Isa 10:12]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּם‎</span> also [[Ps.18.28|Ps 18:28]] (so read also \|\| [[2Sam.22.28|2Sam 22:28]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]), [[2Sam.131.1|2Sam 131:1]]; [[Prov.6.17|Prov 6:17]]; [[Prov.21.4|Prov 21:4]] humility, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁח ע‎</span> [[Job.22.29|Job 22:29]] mockery, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלְעַג לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.30.17|Prov 30:17]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה ע‎</span> [[Deut.15.9|Deut 15:9]] (grudging), [[Deut.28.54|Deut 28:54]]; [[Deut.28.56|Deut 28:56]] (***id.***); especially (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתָּֿחֹס‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> ***not have pity on*** [[Deut.7.16|Deut 7:16]] + 4 t. Deuteronomy; [[Ezek.5.11|Ezek 5:11]] + 8 t. Ezekiel; [[Isa.13.18|Isa 13:18]], also [[Gen.45.20|Gen 45:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; = not regret); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹחַם יִסָּתֵר מֵע‎</span> [[Hos.13.14|Hos 13:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחְמַד ע‎</span> [[Ezek.24.16|Ezek 24:16]] ***desire of the eyes***, so v[[Ezek.24.21|Ezek 24:21]] v[[Ezek.24.25|Ezek 24:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁקּוּצֵי ע‎</span> [[Ezek.20.7|Ezek 20:7]] ***abominations of the eyes***, so v[[Ezek.20.8|Ezek 20:8]]. — [[Ps.73.7|Ps 73:7]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵלֶב‎</span>. 

**3.** Figurative of mental and spiritual faculties, acts and states: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפָּקַחְנָה ע‎</span> [[Gen.3.5|Gen 3:5]]; [[Gen.3.7|Gen 3:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Isa.42.7|Isa 42:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּלּוּי ע‎</span> [[Num.24.4|Num 24:4]]; [[Num.24.16|Num 24:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טַח מֵרְאוֺת ע‎</span> [[Isa.44.18|Isa 44:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶליֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ps.123.2|Ps 123:2]] (see v[[Ps.123.2|Ps 123:2]] v[[Ps.123.2|Ps 123:2]] for origin of figurative), +; of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Ps.33.18|Ps 33:18]] (i.e. his favour) [[Ps.34.16|Ps 34:16]] (***id.*** +. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַזִּנוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Ezek.6.9|Ezek 6:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׂבַּע ע‎</span> [[Eccl.1.8|Eccl 1:8]]; [[Eccl.4.8|Eccl 4:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁאֲלוּ ע‎</span> [[Eccl.2.10|Eccl 2:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְֹנכַח יַבִּיטוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Prov.4.25|Prov 4:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טוֺבעֿ‎</span> [[Prov.22.9|Prov 22:9]] = ***bountiful***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַע עָ֑יִן‎</span> [[Prov.23.6|Prov 23:6]] = ***niggardly one***, so [[Prov.28.22|Prov 28:22]] eye as avenue of temptation [[Job.31.1|Job 31:1]]; [[Job.31.7|Job 31:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁית ע‎</span> [[Ps.17.11|Ps 17:11]] = designation 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵינֵי‎</span>, with adjective and intransitive verbs, ***in the view, opinion, of*** [[Gen.16.4|Gen 16:4]]; [[Gen.16.5|Gen 16:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.21.11|Gen 21:11]]; [[Gen.21.12|Gen 21:12]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.34.18|Gen 34:18]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), + often; with active verb [[2Sam.10.3|2Sam 10:3]] = [[1Chr.19.3|1Chr 19:3]]; [[Esth.1.17|Esth 1:17]]; [[Esth.3.6|Esth 3:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַטּוֺב בְּע‎</span> [[Gen.16.6|Gen 16:6]]; [[Gen.19.14|Gen 19:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), +, i.e. what one pleases, [[Num.36.6|Num 36:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) whom they please; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּשָׁר בְּע‎</span> [[Deut.12.8|Deut 12:8]]; [[Deut.12.25|Deut 12:25]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַטּוֺב וְהַיָּשָׁר בְּע‎</span> v[[Deut.12.28|Deut 12:28]]; [[Josh.9.25|Josh 9:25]] ([[BDB#D|D]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרַע בְּע‎</span> [[Judg.2.11|Judg 2:11]]; [[Judg.3.7|Judg 3:7]]; [[Deut.4.25|Deut 4:25]] + especially [[BDB#D|D]] and Kings ([[BDB#R|R]]<sup>D</sup>); so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְנֶגֶד עיניו‎</span> [[2Sam.22.25|2Sam 22:25]] = [[Ps.18.25|Ps 18:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרֵי עֵינֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Num.15.39|Num 15:39]] = according to your wish, fancy (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבַבְכֶם‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶעְלָם מֵע‎</span> [[Lev.4.13|Lev 4:13]] i.e. hid from knowledge of, so [[Num.5.13|Num 5:13]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Job.28.21|Job 28:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵע‎</span> [[Num.15.24|Num 15:24]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) ***without the knowledge of***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַעְלִים ע‎</span> [[Isa.1.15|Isa 1:15]] = disregard, pay no attention; compare [[Lev.20.4|Lev 20:4]] ([[BDB#H|H]]) [[Ezek.22.26|Ezek 22:26]] without <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, absolute, [[Prov.28.27|Prov 28:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִסְתְּרוּ מֵע‎</span> [[Isa.65.16|Isa 65:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּסְתֵּר עָמָל מֵע‎</span> [[Job.3.10|Job 3:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בּוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַעְלִים ע‎</span> (i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּכֹּפֶר‎</span>) [[1Sam.12.3|1Sam 12:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נעלים‎</span> ***sandals*** + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענו בי‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]], compare Ecclus<sup>xlvi. 19</sup>; [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] insert <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענו בי‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֹּׁחַד יְעַוֵּר ע‎</span> [[Deut.16.19|Deut 16:19]], compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּסוּת ע‎</span> [[Gen.20.16|Gen 20:16]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). 

**4.** Transferred meanings: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** visible ***surface*** of earth [[Exod.10.5|Exod 10:5]]; [[Exod.10.15|Exod 10:15]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Num.22.5|Num 22:5]]; [[Num.22.11|Num 22:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***appearance*** [[Lev.13.5|Lev 13:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; reading <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּעֵינוֺ‎</span> [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Kau|Kau]] [[BDB#Dr-Wh|Dr-Wh]]), v[[Lev.13.37|Lev 13:37]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; reading ***id.***), v[[Lev.13.55|Lev 13:55]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Num.11.7|Num 11:7]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); so apparently dual [[1Sam.16.7|1Sam 16:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** ***gleam, sparkle*** (of metal, jewels, etc.) [[Ezek.1.4|Ezek 1:4]]; [[Ezek.1.7|Ezek 1:7]]; [[Ezek.1.16|Ezek 1:16]]; [[Ezek.1.22|Ezek 1:22]]; [[Ezek.1.27|Ezek 1:27]]; [[Ezek.8.2|Ezek 8:2]]; [[Ezek.10.9|Ezek 10:9]]; [[Dan.10.6|Dan 10:6]] of wine [[Prov.23.31|Prov 23:31]].


**5.** Other phrases are: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Exod.21.24|Exod 21:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) = [[Lev.24.20|Lev 24:20]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Deut.19.21|Deut 19:21]], all = ***an eye for an eye***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> = ***eye to eye***, [[Num.14.14|Num 14:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Isa.52.8|Isa 52:8]] (figurative), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְאֶינָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתעֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְע‎</span> [[Jer.32.4|Jer 32:4]]; [[Jer.34.3|Jer 34:3]] especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעֵינֵי‎</span> ***in the presence of, in full view of*** [[Gen.42.24|Gen 42:24]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Gen.47.19|Gen 47:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.4.30|Exod 4:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Num.19.5|Num 19:5]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), + oft; of business transaction [[Jer.32.12|Jer 32:12]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.23.11|Gen 23:11]]; [[Gen.23.18|Gen 23:18]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶגֶד ע‎</span> [[Joel.1.16|Joel 1:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְנֶגֶד ע‎</span> [[Job.4.16|Job 4:16]], and even <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּע‎</span> [[1Sam.21.14|1Sam 21:14]]; [[Ezra.3.12|Ezra 3:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִגְרַזְתּי מִנֶּגֶד ע‎</span> [[Ps.31.23|Ps 31:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּין ע‎</span> = ***on the forehead*** [[Exod.13.9|Exod 13:9]]; [[Exod.13.16|Exod 13:16]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.6.8|Deut 6:8]]; [[Deut.11.18|Deut 11:18]]; [[Deut.14.1|Deut 14:1]]; [[Dan.8.5|Dan 8:5]]; [[Dan.8.21|Dan 8:21]]. 



<small>Also see: [[H5871]] | [[H5878]] | [[H8179]]</small>

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַ֫יִן‎</span> **noun feminine** ==spring== (of water) (connection with I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> dubious; Late Hebrew ***id.***, Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ען‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ênu, înu;***</u></abbr> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עינא‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיְינָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.29.1|1Sam 29:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ֑יִן‎</span> [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעַ֫יְנָה‎</span> [[Gen.24.16|Gen 24:16]]; [[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין‎</span> v[[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲיָנֹת‎</span> [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺת‎</span>- [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]] = [[Num.33.9|Num 33:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִינוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.8.28|Prov 8:28]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:93v»§ 93v</sup>); — ***spring*** [[Gen.16.7|Gen 16:7]]; [[Gen.24.16|Gen 24:16]]; [[Gen.24.29|Gen 24:29]]; [[Gen.24.30|Gen 24:30]]; [[Gen.24.42|Gen 24:42]]; [[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]) [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.29.1|1Sam 29:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין חַמַּיִם‎</span> [[Gen.16.7|Gen 16:7]]; [[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]]; [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Num.33.9|Num 33:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלֵי מַיִם ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְחֹמֹת‎</span> [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי הָעֲיָנוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהוֺם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ְ‎</span> [[Prov.8.28|Prov 8:28]] (i.e. of the sea); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין יַעֲקֹב‎</span> [[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]] (poem), i.e. Jacob's descendants. Particular springs are: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲרֹד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Judg.7.1|Judg 7:1]] (on location compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקּוֺרֵא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (***partridge-spring***) [[Judg.15.19|Judg 15:19]] (compare ***id.***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹגֵּל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> near Jerusalem (early sanctuary [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 157, 2nd ed. 172</sup>) [[2Sam.17.17|2Sam 17:17]] compare [[1Kgs.1.2|1Kgs 1:2]], on border of Judah [[Josh.15.7|Josh 15:7]], and Benjamin [[Josh.18.16|Josh 18:16]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתַּנִּין‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (***dragon-spring***) [[Neh.2.13|Neh 2:13]] (= **c** ? so [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>l.c</sup>.). — On <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר הָעַיִן‎</span> [[Neh.2.14|Neh 2:14]]; [[Neh.3.15|Neh 3:15]]; [[Neh.12.37|Neh 12:37]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר‎</span>
